description: This source file defines functions for generating JSON-RPC API headers, schemas, and related code, including class and enum code generation, version info, and stub code, based on JSON schemas and configuration settings.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file for JSON-RPC API with include directives and boilerplate comments.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function to generate JSON-RPC schema-based code, including classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementations, based on provided schema and configuration.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
